titleStmt.title: An elegie on the death of the most illustrious prince, Henry Duke of Glocester. By Martin LLuelyn Dr in Ph. sworn phy: to His Majesty: principall of S. M. Hall Oxon. and fellow of the Coll. of Phy. Lond.
titleStmt.author: Lluelyn, Martin, 1616-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Hen. Hall printer to the University, for Ric. Davis,

notesStmt.note: Black border and woodcut illus. on t.p.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
